name: Web3 Community Building Strategies
description:
Rough agenda:

  • Introduction (10 minutes)
  • Identifying and Attracting Your Target Audience (20 minutes)
  • Communication and Platforms (30 minutes)
  • Encouraging Engagement and Collaboration (30 minutes)
  • Community Growth Strategies (30 minutes)
  • Break (10 minutes)
  • Tokenomics and Incentive Mechanisms (30 minutes)
  • Measuring Success and Analytics (20 minutes)
  • Q&A and Wrap-up (30 minutes)
